description: QFD photon scattering fit to DES5YR - 7304 SNe from RAW QFD processing (NO SALT/SALT2/SALT3 corrections, NO ΛCDM assumptions)

parameters.name: alpha_QFD
parameters.description: QFD scattering coupling strength (τ = α × z^β), constrained by Lean proof: 0 < α < 2

parameters.name: beta
parameters.description: Redshift power law exponent (sub-linear to linear)

parameters.name: Omega_M
parameters.description: Matter density parameter - FROZEN at 1.0 (matter-only universe, no dark energy)

datasets.notes: 7304 Type Ia SNe from raw DES5yr photometry, processed with QFD model directly on flux measurements. NO SALT corrections applied. This avoids circular reasoning where ΛCDM assumptions are baked into the data standardization.
